mapper.sql: TRANSPORT_RECORD_ID, TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID, TRANSPORT_ORDER_CODE, TRANSPORTER_ID, DRIVER_ID, REPORT_DATE, CAR_NUMBER, CURRENT_LOAD_WEIGHT, LNG, LAT, TRANSPORT_STATUS, CUMULATIVE_KM, SPEED, TEMPERATURE, HUMIDITY, STRESS, CORP_ID

trecord.TRANSPORT_RECORD_ID, trecord.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID, trecord.TRANSPORT_ORDER_CODE, trecord.TRANSPORTER_ID, tr.TRANSPORTER_CODE, tr.TRACTIR_VIN,trecord.DRIVER_ID, USER.USER_NAME AS DRIVER_NAME, user.USER_CODE as DRIVER_CODE,tr.TRACTIR_PLATE_CODE, trecord.REPORT_DATE, trecord.CAR_NUMBER, trecord.CURRENT_LOAD_WEIGHT, trecord.LNG, trecord.LAT, trecord.TRANSPORT_STATUS, trecord.CUMULATIVE_KM, trecord.SPEED, trecord.TEMPERATURE, trecord.HUMIDITY, trecord.STRESS, trecord.CORP_ID,CORP.CORP_NAME

where trecord.del = 0 and trecord.TRANSPORT_RECORD_ID = #{transportRecordId} and trecord.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID = #{transportOrderId} and (trecord.TRANSPORT_ORDER_CODE = #{transportOrderCode} or trecord.TRANSPORT_ORDER_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{transportOrderCode}),'%')) and trecord.TRANSPORTER_ID = #{transporterId} and trecord.DRIVER_ID = #{driverId} and trecord.REPORT_DATE = #{reportDate} and trecord.CAR_NUMBER = #{carNumber} and trecord.CURRENT_LOAD_WEIGHT = #{currentLoadWeight} and trecord.LNG = #{lng} and trecord.LAT = #{lat} and trecord.TRANSPORT_STATUS = #{transportStatus} and trecord.CUMULATIVE_KM = #{cumulativeKm} and trecord.SPEED = #{speed} and trecord.TEMPERATURE = #{temperature} and trecord.HUMIDITY = #{humidity} and trecord.STRESS = #{stress} and trecord.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and (tr.TRACTIR_VIN = #{tractirVin} or tr.TRACTIR_VIN like concat(concat('%',#{tractirVin}),'%')) and ( user.USER_CODE = #{refDriverCode} or user.USER_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{refDriverCode}),'%')) and ( user.USER_NAME = #{refDriverCode} or user.USER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{refDriverName}),'%')) and (tr.TRACTIR_PLATE_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{refTractirPlateCode}),'%') ) and (tr.TRAILER_PLATE_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{refTrailerPlateCode}),'%') ) and ( tr.TRACTIR_PLATE_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') or trecord.TRANSPORT_ORDER_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') )
mapper.select: select from om_transport_record trecord left join om_transport_order tso on tso.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID = trecord.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID left join tc_transporter tr on tr.TRANSPORTER_ID = trecord.TRANSPORTER_ID left join bd_user user ON user.USER_ID = trecord.DRIVER_ID left join SYS_CORP corp on corp.CORP_ID = trecord.CORP_ID where trecord.del = 0 and trecord.TRANSPORT_RECORD_ID = #{transportRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into OM_TRANSPORT_RECORD (TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID, TRANSPORT_ORDER_CODE, TRANSPORTER_ID, DRIVER_ID, REPORT_DATE, CAR_NUMBER, CURRENT_LOAD_WEIGHT, LNG, LAT, TRANSPORT_STATUS, CUMULATIVE_KM, SPEED, TEMPERATURE, HUMIDITY, STRESS, CORP_ID) values (#{transportOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transportOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentLoadWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{transportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cumulativeKm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{humidity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{stress,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into OM_TRANSPORT_RECORD TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID, TRANSPORT_ORDER_CODE, TRANSPORTER_ID, DRIVER_ID, REPORT_DATE, CAR_NUMBER, CURRENT_LOAD_WEIGHT, LNG, LAT, TRANSPORT_STATUS, CUMULATIVE_KM, SPEED, TEMPERATURE, HUMIDITY, STRESS, CORP_ID, #{transportOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{transportOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentLoadWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{transportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cumulativeKm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{humidity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{stress,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update: update OM_TRANSPORT_RECORD TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID = #{transportOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRANSPORT_ORDER_CODE = #{transportOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORTER_ID = #{transporterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DRIVER_ID = #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REPORT_DATE = #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CAR_NUMBER = #{carNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_LOAD_WEIGHT = #{currentLoadWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TRANSPORT_STATUS = #{transportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUMULATIVE_KM = #{cumulativeKm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SPEED = #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TEMPERATURE = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HUMIDITY = #{humidity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, STRESS = #{stress,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, where TRANSPORT_RECORD_ID = #{transportRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update OM_TRANSPORT_RECORD set TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID = #{transportOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRANSPORT_ORDER_CODE = #{transportOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORTER_ID = #{transporterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DRIVER_ID = #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REPORT_DATE = #{reportDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CAR_NUMBER = #{carNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_LOAD_WEIGHT = #{currentLoadWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TRANSPORT_STATUS = #{transportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CUMULATIVE_KM = #{cumulativeKm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SPEED = #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TEMPERATURE = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HUMIDITY = #{humidity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, STRESS = #{stress,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where TRANSPORT_RECORD_ID = #{transportRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from om_transport_record trecord join om_transport_order tso on tso.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID = trecord.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID left join tc_transporter tr on tr.TRANSPORTER_ID = trecord.TRANSPORTER_ID left join bd_user user ON user.USER_ID = trecord.DRIVER_ID left join SYS_CORP corp on corp.CORP_ID = trecord.CORP_ID order by trecord.TRANSPORT_RECORD_ID DESC
